title: The 2025 seller intelligence report
description: Discover which homeowner behaviors predict listings in 2025 and how to activate them.
body:
Inside the 2025 Seller Intelligence Report

  • The three data signals that forecast listings with 92% accuracy.
  • Territory heat maps to plan budget by micro-market.
  • Playbooks for activating high propensity sellers across channels.

title: Three nurture flows that convert seller leads
description: Automated sequences proven to move homeowners from interest to appointment.
body:
Flow 1: Hyper-local welcome

Send three touches within the first week referencing local market stats.

title: SmartLead x HubSpot integration guide
description: Step-by-step workbook to sync SmartLead campaigns to HubSpot workflows.
body:
Mapping SmartLead to HubSpot

Use deal stages to trigger nurture actions and set up closed-loop attribution.

title: Live demo: Predictive listing intelligence
description: See how SmartLead surfaces homeowners most likely to sell in your market.
body:
What you will see in the live demo

  • Predictive seller scoring inside the territory planner.
  • How campaigns adapt when inventory levels change.
  • Ways to hand off hot opportunities to your CRM automatically.
